column2: an A.M. Eatery////Staff is really great here
column3: the General Manager basically stays outside to help with parking
column4: wow! Super nice guys. The place gets super packed
column6: so we went on Saturday. The little secret to reserving a seat at the time you want is to swing by
column7: put your name down for a time
column8: is what I was told or you can just put your name down and when they text you
